mosinstall.name: BlogRush Widget Module
mosinstall.author: Information Madness
mosinstall.description:
Recently launched BlogRush, a content syndication network that claims to be capable of sending free, targeted traffic to your blog.

This widget will get links to related articles from other blogs in your niche. But don't get affraid, the links will open up in a new window so you will not loose your visitor.

Similarly, your blog's links will be displayed on other blog's widgets. So if you have 100 pageviews/day, your link will be displayed 100 times/day on other websites.

Check out the BlogRush website for more details & video Demo. Register yourself at BlogRush, get your blogrush_feed ID and enter it in this module. Make sure you change the BlogRush ID before publishing your module

param.name: blogrushId
param.label: BlogRush ID
param.description: Enter the ID given by BlogRush Widget Code.
